root: ^Hey! What are you working on? I heard you mentioning Eclipse 2...
^Oh, hello, yes I was just trying to find a way to design this level.
^You see? I'm wondering if I should add more fire in this section...
^Isn't it your job to do this? Why are you showing your work to the new girl?
^Oh, I'm sorry it is my fault. I was just walking and I heard him talking about-
^Really. And why are you eavesdropping here?
^Why are you talking to her like that? She didn't do anything wrong.
^Be careful, Mark. Or maybe you can't wait another party...
^I really think that we should just forget about it. Sorry again.
